issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: HDFS Path named with file:// instead of file:/// results in Unit test failures in Windows

comments.body:
Can you put this on RB?
I thought that on Windows, URI.getPath() would return a path starting with "/" (for example, new URI("file:///c:/test/test.py").getPath() returns "/c:/test/test.py"), and this allowed a lot of the stuff with "file://" to work properly. Would you be able to make changes like that where possible - for Path/File try using toUri().getPath() to get a proper path string.

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 at least one tests failed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12669255/HIVE-8148.1.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 1 failed/errored test(s), 6280 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
{noformat}
org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse.TestParse.testParse_union
{noformat}
